DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this trial is to determine the effect of linaclotide on abdominal girth in irritable bowel syndrome with constipation (IBS-C) participants with the baseline symptoms of abdominal bloating and an increased abdominal girth.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Effect of Linaclotide on Abdominal Girth in Participants With IBS-C
